data.chText: 快捷地；轻而易举地；便利地

data.enText: All ingredients are readily available from your local store.
data.chText: 所有的原料都可以方便地从你当地的商店买到。

data.enText: in a way that shows you do not object to sth
Most people readily accept the need for laws.
data.chText: 大多数人都毫不迟疑地认为法律是必要的。

simple_means.memory_skill: read(y) 预备好了的状态 + -ly ...地

example: these snakes can be identified readily

example.ex: I asked her if she would allow me to interview her, and she readily agreed...
example.tran: 我问她是否允许我采访她，她欣然同意了。

example.ex: When I was invited to the party, I readily accepted.
example.tran: 当被邀请参加聚会的时候，我一口答应了。

value.def: If you do something readily, you do it in a way which shows that you are very willing to do it.

example.ex: The components are readily available in hardware shops...
example.tran: 这些零件很容易在五金商店买到。

value.def: You also use readily to say that something can be done or obtained quickly and easily. For example, if you say that something can be readily understood, you mean that people can understand it quickly and easily.

partsOfSpeech.d: (强调真实无误)绝对地，完全地
紧密地；接近地；仔细地；严密地；精密地

partsOfSpeech.dec: con- 共同, 一起 + sequ 跟随 + -ent ...的 + -ly ...地
con- 共同, 一起 + vers  转 + -e + -ly ...地
exclusive adj.排除其他一切的 + -ly ...地
fortun(e) 运气 + -ate 具有...的 + -ly ...地
free adj.不受他人控制的 + -ly ...地
increas(e) 增加 + -ing 形容词后缀 + -ly ...地

partsOfSpeech.d: (对自己的话很有把握，希望他人同意)想必

partsOfSpeech.dec: un- 否定 + like 像 + -ly ...地
in- 不,无 + variabl(e) 可变的 + -ly ...地

partsOfSpeech.d: (引出新话题、附加信息、或临时想到的问题)顺便提一句

partsOfSpeech.dec: literal adj.按字面常用意义理解的 + -ly ...地
